name: 江佩穎
objective: 本科目旨在介紹計算機系統之基礎觀念以及應用。主要內容包括：1.計算機系統簡介 2 .資料的表示法、數字系統、邏輯3.周邊裝置及儲存體 4. 程式語言與程式設計5. 軟體工程與系統開發工具6.資料結構與演算法 7.作業系統 8.檔案與資料庫 9.資料通訊與計算機網路10.人工智慧 11. 新興技術介紹
schedule:
Week1: Chapter1: Introduction and history
Week2: Chapter2: Binary values and number systems
Week3: Chapter3: Data representation
Week4: Chapter4: Gates and Circuits
Week5: Chapter5: Computing Components
Midterm1
Week6: Chapter6: Low level programming language and Pseudocode
Week7: Chapter7: Problem solving and Algorithms
Week8: Chapter8: Abstract data types and subprograms
Week9: Chapter9: Object-oriented design and high-level programming languages
Week10: Chapter10: Operating systems
Midterm2
Week11: Chapter11: File systems and Directories
Week12: Chapter12: Information systems
Week13: Chapter13: Networks
Week14: Chapter14: The World Wide Web
Week15: Chapter15: Applications: AI, Graphics, Database
Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Homework Assignments: 20 %
2 Midterm Exams : 20% each
Final Exam: 30%
Quiz and Attendance: 10%
Bonus: 0.5 point
materials: Computer Science Illuminated”, Nell Dale and John Lewis, fifth edition
